explain.statement: SELECT true AS present, p.cost IS NOT MISSING AS cost, p.cardinality IS NOT MISSING AS cardinality FROM $explan AS p WHERE ANY v WITHIN p.plan.`~children` SATISFIES v.`#operator` = 'Order' AND CONTAINS(v.`sort_terms`[0].`expr`, "_index_key") END

statements: SELECT c2, c3, c4 FROM orders WHERE test_id = "indexCBO" AND c1 = 1 AND (c2 = 311 OR c4 = 221) ORDER BY c6 LIMIT 2

explain.statement: SELECT true AS present, p.cost IS NOT MISSING AS cost, p.cardinality IS NOT MISSING AS cardinality FROM $explan AS p WHERE ANY v WITHIN p.plan.`~children` SATISFIES v.`#operator` = 'UnionScan' END

statements: SELECT c2, c3, c4 FROM orders WHERE test_id = "indexCBO" AND c1 = 1 AND (c2 = 311 OR c4 = 221) ORDER BY c6
